content:
# Factorio Agent Report (Updated)

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Electricity generation system at x=-25.0 y=80.5
Consists of:
- Offshore pump at x=-20.5 y=69.5 (connected with pipes)
- Boiler at x=-25.0 y=80.5 (working with coal fuel, fuel level: 8)
- Missing steam engine at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (previously existed but now missing)
- Pipe networks:
  - Water system connecting pump to boiler (functional)
  - Steam system (status unknown due to missing steam engine)

### Copper mining operation at x=-55.5 y=70.5
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=-55.5 y=70.5 (powered but waiting for space)
- Burner inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 (working, fuel: 9 coal)
- Stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 (fuel: 10 coal, no ingredients)
- Wooden chest at x=-55.5 y=76.5 (empty output storage)

### Iron mining operation at x=15.5 y=70.5
(No changes from previous report)
Consists of:
- Electric mining drill at x=15.5 y=70.5 (currently no power)
- Stone furnace at x=16.0 y=74.0 (no ingredients)
- Burner inserter at x=15.5 y=72.5 (working)
- Wooden chest at x=15.5 y=75.5 (empty output storage)

## ERROR TIPS

### Entity management issues
- Steam engine missing at x=-25.5 y=89.5 (previously existed)
- Inconsistent entity state tracking (burner inserter appears and disappears at x=-55.5 y=72.5)
- Implement entity verification before operations (multiple "no entity found" errors)

### Power network problems
- Complete power network connections (missing steam engine affecting whole system)
- Resolve small electric pole placement issues (8 consecutive failed placement attempts)
- Verify power pole placement positions (existing objects blocking placement)

### Resource management
- Monitor coal supplies (boiler fuel running low at 8 units)
- Implement fuel checks before insertion attempts (failed to insert coal with empty inventory)
- Clear output blockages (copper drill still waiting for space)

### Production chain monitoring
- Supply ingredients to furnace (stone furnace at x=-55.0 y=75.0 still has no ingredients)
- Verify inserter functionality (inserter at x=-55.5 y=72.5 waiting for source items)
- Monitor production outputs (zero copper plates produced)

### System verification
- Implement connection status verification (boiler shows working but steam system incomplete)
- Verify fluid systems (steam system status unknown due to missing engine)
- Monitor power production and consumption metrics (voltage shows 0)
